Directory of Experts Guibault, François Poly Directory Courses Français Directory of Experts Guibault, François Directory of Experts Back to search results Edit my profileHelp Publications Link(s) François Guibault B.Ing., M.Sc.A., Ph.D. (Poly) Publications Link(s) Director of Graduate Studies Office of Educational Support and Student Experience Full Professor Department of Computer Engineering and Software Engineering Phone: (514) 340-4711 Ext. 4876 Room: A-205.4.7 francois.guibault@polymtl.ca Areas of expertise Modelling, simulation and finite element methods Modelling, simulation Software engineering Graphics Information systems design Numerical analysis Primary sphere of excellence in research Modeling and Artificial Intelligence Secondary sphere(s) of excellence in research Industry of the Future and Digital Society Human Health Research interests and affiliations Research interests Geometric modeling. Mesh generation and adaptation. Shape generation and optimization. Deep learning. Affiliation(s) Laboratoire de recherche en maillage et géométrie numérique (MAGNU), Director NSERC Industrial Chair in Geothermal Energy for Geothermal Standing Column Wells in Industrial Buildings, Member Institut de l'énergie Trottier (IET), Member Institute for Data Valorization (IVADO), Member Fluid Dynamics Laboratory (LADYF), Member Expertise type(s) (NSERC subjects) 2107 Modelling, simulation and finite element methods 2203 Modelling, simulation 2706 Software engineering 2707 Graphics 2710 Information systems design 2955 Numerical analysis Publications Recent publications Journal article Valtchanov, H., Piché, N., Braïlovski, V., Byers, J.
